trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The scaleshield can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scaleshield makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spiked Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Shield Block
entries: If an ally within 5 feet of the scaleshield is hit by an attack, the scaleshield can reduce that attack's damage by half.
